TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_ZAVEID.name: A Promise Made
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_ZAVEID.description: Proof a promise was made between the reaper and a fighter. You can be sure that promise will be fulfilled.

TROPHY_ID_CHARACTER_TITLE_COMPLETE.name: A Solid B
TROPHY_ID_CHARACTER_TITLE_COMPLETE.description: Bring all characters' titles to level 2. You seem to have a pretty good grasp of what each character can do.

TROPHY_ID_GALD_HIGHER.name: A Veritable Gald Mine
TROPHY_ID_GALD_HIGHER.description: Proof of doing whatever it takes in the pursuit of Gald. Don't spend it all in one place! Unless you really want to.

TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_004.name: Backtalker
TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_004.description: Defeat the dire foe, Bacturnian Man. You can walk away happy now.

TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_002.name: Bee Stinger
TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_002.description: Defeat the dire foe, Queen Bee. Discretion is the better part of valor, but failing to escape is just fate.

TROPHY_ID_HIT_HIGHER.name: Centurion
TROPHY_ID_HIT_HIGHER.description: Perform a combo with 100 or more hits. Overwhelm your foe with artistic style!

TROPHY_ID_COMPLETE.name: Champion of Berseria
TROPHY_ID_COMPLETE.description: Proof of conquering the world with Velvet and company. Thank you for playing!

TROPHY_ID_COOK_COMPLETE.name: Chef's Soul
TROPHY_ID_COOK_COMPLETE.description: You can make any type of food. That's pretty cool, right? Well, eat up and get back to battle!

TROPHY_ID_HUNT_COMPLETE.name: Code Red? More Like Code Dead
TROPHY_ID_HUNT_COMPLETE.description: Proof of hunting every last code red daemon. You've brought an end to that battle.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_KAMENIN.name: Dawn of Darkness
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_KAMENIN.description: Proof of witnessing and overcoming the dawn of darkness. But beware, for a turtle never forgetz.

TROPHY_ID_SHOP_RANK_MAX.name: Economic Linchpin
TROPHY_ID_SHOP_RANK_MAX.description: You buy. You sell. You strengthen equipment. A preferred customer like you is a mover, a shaker, and a genuine job creator.

TROPHY_ID_ARENA_COMPLETE.name: Emergency Management
TROPHY_ID_ARENA_COMPLETE.description: Proof of conquering every Class 4 Administrative Zone. Yeah, you can brag about this.

TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_003.name: Enough Monkeying Around
TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_003.description: Defeat the dire foe, Sacred Baboon. Where's the fun in being polite all the time?

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_AIZEN.name: Follower of the Creed
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_AIZEN.description: Proof Eizen has settled one score. But there are still payments to be made. That's part of the creed.

TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_001.name: Hanging with the Hanged Man
TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_001.description: Defeat the dire foe, Hanged Man. You'll always have a friend nearby.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_ELEANOR.name: Hope Surpassing Reason
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_ELEANOR.description: Proof Eleanor found her answer. She sees with her own two eyes now, but where is her gaze fixed?

TROPHY_ID_VEHICLE_COMPLETE.name: I'll Take My Board
TROPHY_ID_VEHICLE_COMPLETE.description: Proof of unlocking every geotree. Can you do any sweet tricks on that thing?

TROPHY_ID_ITEM_COMPLETE.name: Item Collector
TROPHY_ID_ITEM_COMPLETE.description: Gels, equipment, food, costumes, valuables. From the powerful and precious to the downright weird, this is proof you've collected it all.

TROPHY_ID_CATBOX_COMPLETE.name: Katz Person
TROPHY_ID_CATBOX_COMPLETE.description: You must really love katz to have collected so many katz spirits! That's the spirit, meow!

TROPHY_ID_ENEMY_COMPLETE.name: Know Thine Enemy
TROPHY_ID_ENEMY_COMPLETE.description: Proof of earning untold wisdom through  defeating countless foes in battle after battle. There's no weakness you can't exploit.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_MAGIROUX.name: Magilou's Magnificent Menagerie
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_MAGIROUX.description: Proof that Magilou's Menagerie performed perfectly. A capacity crowd! A standing ovation! No refunds!

TROPHY_ID_MINIGAME.name: Making a Mint
TROPHY_ID_MINIGAME.description: You've earned Tales Coins by relaxing and playing. Who knew they'd pile up like this?

TROPHY_ID_DAMAGE_HIGHER.name: Miraculous Myriad
TROPHY_ID_DAMAGE_HIGHER.description: Inflict 10,000 or more damage with a single hit. Use Break Soul combos, increased damage from stuns, and various skills to create the ultimate crushing blow.

TROPHY_ID_SHIP_TREASURE_COMPLETE.name: Pirate Legend
TROPHY_ID_SHIP_TREASURE_COMPLETE.description: Proof of sailing every water and discovering every treasure. There's no stone in this world you've left unturned.

TROPHY_ID_CRYSTAL_COMPLETE.name: Potentite Purist
TROPHY_ID_CRYSTAL_COMPLETE.description: Collect every glacite. The power is in your hands!

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_ROKUROU.name: Rangetsu Initiate
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_ROKUROU.description: Proof of conquering masters of the sword. Rokurou's skills have reached their zenith.

TROPHY_ID_LONGCHAT_COMPLETE.name: Refreshing Conversation
TROPHY_ID_LONGCHAT_COMPLETE.description: The main story is nice and all, but it's important to stop and smell the roses. You've learned some surprising things, haven't you?

TROPHY_ID_BREAK_SOUL_COMPLETE.name: Shattered Soul
TROPHY_ID_BREAK_SOUL_COMPLETE.description: Proof of using every Break Soul. Use this unique power wisely and you'll be able to overcome any foe.

TROPHY_ID_SOUL_HIGHER.name: Soul Vacuum
TROPHY_ID_SOUL_HIGHER.description: Collect 20 or more souls in a single battle. Seek out dangerous fights and crush the reinforcements!

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_GUEST.name: Striding Beyond the End
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_GUEST.description: Proof of defeating visitors from another world. They will travel on, though, as long as their mission remains.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_001.name: The Beast Uncaged
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_001.description: Proof of escaping the island prison. Velvet's fight for revenge begins here.

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_LIFESET.name: The Curious Youth
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_LIFESET.description: Proof Laphicet knows 50 or more skills. He is at an age of expanding curiosity and swift growth.

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_ELEANOR.name: The Earnest Soldier
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_ELEANOR.description: Proof Eleanor knows 50 or more skills. Despite her misgivings, she'll step steadily forward, her spear firmly in hand.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_VELVET.name: The Great Gorger
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_VELVET.description: Proof Velvet has relearned the culinary artes. Her Culinary Mystic Arte? Quiche, of course.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_002.name: The Hero's Bane
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_002.description: Proof of attacking the world's savior. You will defeat him by any means necessary!

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_ROKUROU.name: The Honorable Warrior
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_ROKUROU.description: Proof Rokurou knows 50 or more skills. He will pay the debts he owes. That's the Rangetsu way.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_006.name: The Howling Calamity
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_006.description: Proof of the will to finish the fight against the exorcists. Once all is devoured, it will be done.

TROPHY_ID_LEVEL_MAX.name: The Last Level
TROPHY_ID_LEVEL_MAX.description: Raise a character to level 200. There's nothing that can challenge you now... Or is there?

TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_005.name: The Lindwurm Turns
TROPHY_ID_WANDERING_ENEMY_005.description: Defeat the dire foe, Lindwurm. Did you ever think that maybe you're the real dire foe?

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_LIFESET.name: The Praying Malak
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_LIFESET.description: Proof of creating the Omega Elixir. Laphicet now has something more precious than any item.

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_AIZEN.name: The Pugnacious Skipper
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_AIZEN.description: Proof Eizen knows 50 or more skills. He's got a fist strong enough to overturn fate and protect his friends.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_003.name: The Sower of Strife
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_003.description: Proof of destroying reason and plunging the world into chaos. Your quest still goes on.

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_VELVET.name: The Stone-Cold Killer
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_VELVET.description: Proof Velvet knows 50 or more skills. She'll do whatever she has to in the pursuit of her goal.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_004.name: The Transgressor's Chains
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_004.description: Proof of knowing your sin and its price. There is no escape now.

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_MAGIROUX.name: The Unorthodox Witch
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_MASTER_MAGIROUX.description: Proof Magilou knows 50 or more skills. Her words are questionable, but her ability is authentic.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_005.name: The Unquenchable Flame
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_005.description: Proof of learning the true story. In spite of this—No, because of this, you must go on.

TROPHY_ID_TREASUREBOX_COMPLETE.name: Treasure Hunter
TROPHY_ID_TREASUREBOX_COMPLETE.description: An award given to those who find treasure chests and open them. The contents don't matter. It's all for the thrill of pulling back that lid.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_SPA.name: Ultimate Stress Relief
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_SPA.description: Proof of relaxing to the max in an unusual bath. The relief has washed away all memories of clearing the hidden dungeon.

TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_007.name: Velvet Crowe
TROPHY_ID_SCENARIO_007.description: Proof of seeing the end of the tale. Now you can go another round or aim at completion!

TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_POWERUP_HIGHER.name: Whetstone and Polish
TROPHY_ID_EQUIP_POWERUP_HIGHER.description: You've strengthened equipment 50 times. You seem to have the hang of this. Now go out there and make the best equipment possible!

TROPHY_ID_MYSTIC_COMPLETE.name: Witness to the Mystic
TROPHY_ID_MYSTIC_COMPLETE.description: Proof of seeing every mystic arte. Luck is also a talent.
